snippet: Officials said the site was off-line for about two hours during peak traffic hours because of a problem with regular maintenance of the site.
abstract: New York Times Web site is off-line for about two hours in what company officials say is failure during regular maintenance of NYTimes.com and not result of a cyberattack.
lead_paragraph: Officials said the site was off-line for about two hours during peak traffic hours because of a problem with regular maintenance of the site.

headline.main: Times Says Web Site Failure Is Not a Result of Cyberattack
headline.print_headline: Times Says Web Site Failure Is Unrelated to Cyberattack
